alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued June 13 at 12:21PM PDT until June 14 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the mid 20`s to near 30 for typical colder valleys with a few lower 20`s possible. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Southwest Elko County, Southern Lander County, Southern Eureka County, and White Pine County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County
